listitem.para: All security updates issued for UCS 4.0-2 are included:

listitem.simpara: The Linux kernel has been updated to 3.16.7-ckt11. It provides many bugfixes and fixes several vulnerabilities (37385).
The UCR variable ipv6/gateway now supports a zone index (35694).
Multiple IPv6 addresses from the same subnet can now be added to an interface (33986).
The handling of the 'prefix' for secondary IPv6 addresses has been corrected (33986).
The title for the entry of UCS in the GRUB boot menu can be configured through the &ucsUCRV; grub/title (38779).
The diversion of the msgpo.schema file introduced as a fix for 38488 has been removed again (38566).
The description for the UCR variable ldap/server/addition has been improved (38094).

The UCR variable ldap/server/addition is used to configure additional LDAP servers in case the primary LDAP server is unavailable. The setting can be configured through a UMC policy 'LDAP server'. Previously the so configured value was written into the NORMAL layer of the &ucsUCR;, which overwrote any setting configured by the user. The value is now written into the LDAP layer, which has a higher priority than the NORMAL layer and thus overrules any local configuration, but preserves the user configured setting. The value can still be overwritten locally by using the FORCED layer of UCR, e.g. ucr set --force ldap/server/addition=.... Setting the UCR variable through a UMC policy '&ucsUCR;' is not recommended and will clash with the 'LDAP server' policy (38094).
Adds UCR variables ldap/tls/ciphersuite and ldap/tls/minprotocol to configure the allowed ciphers and the minimum requires TLS version. By default 'RC4', 'NULL' and 'SSLv3' are now disabled (38685).
Enables Forward Secrecy by default, which can be configured further through several new UCR variables starting with ldap/tls/dh/... (38685).
The attribute ldapFilter has been added to the schema for univentionPolicy objects (36255).
LDAP entries using non-ASCII-characters in their DN are now handled more correctly in case of case differences (35334).
A confusing error message was removed (32819).
The Listener is now restarted asynchronously when the network interfaces are reconfigured (36532).
The Notifier is now restarted asynchronously when the network interfaces are reconfigured (36532).
The configuration files and scripts have been optimized to allow a faster restart when the network interfaces are re-configured (36532).
The "clear input" and "view password" icons are now displayed correctly in the login dialogue with Internet Explorer 10 and above (38127).
It is now possible to create a core dump of the UMC web-server (37280).
A check for free disk space is now only done once per file upload request (38335).
The place holders in the login dialogue are now displayed correctly in Internet Explorer 9 (38127).
Scrolling in the App Center on mobile devices is now more responsive (38050).
A missing pre dependency to python-univention-management-console has been added (38617).
The query string parameters are now passed to automatically started UMC modules (38544).
The handling of the UMC overview page on mobile devices has been improved (38658).
A race condition in the UMC webserver has been fixed which could lead to failing starts of the UMC webserver (37844).
The PID file is no longer created world-writable (38825).
Behaviour and appearance of tooltips has been changed. Tooltips will no longer automatically pop up and need to be opened manually by clicking the tooltip icon (36771).
The module header in UMC modules now sticks smoothly to the top when scrolling down (38491).
The browser next/back buttons have been integrated into UMC in order to simplify its navigation (20714).
The styling of hovered entries on the UMC overview page has been adapted for mobile devices (38658).
New icons for tooltips have been added and the style for tooltips has been adapted (36771).
Added a transition when a UMC module header reaches the top of the screen (38491).
The size of the UMC installer header was too big. This issue has been fixed (39105).
The UMC user wizard was not always terminated after creating a user. This issue has been fixed (39109).
The UMC server does not crash anymore during request processing (37366).
Errors due to a not running LDAP server are now handled by the UMC server process (36794).
It is now possible to create a core dump of the UMC server and UMC module processes (37280).
The username is not treated case sensitive anymore when changing an expired password in the UMC login (38826).
Code for error handling has been moved into the UMC core server (36794).
A parameter to open a specific object immediately on opening a module has been added (38544).
If multiple policies of the same type are referenced UMC prevents removing policy references when saving the object (36256).
If the initialization of the App Center module fails, an error message is shown (33627).
Display error message if contacting the LDAP server fails (36794).
The error messages when contacting the App Center server or the UCS activation fails have been improved (35678).
Errors when opening APT Packages files are now handled (38112).
Errors when the system has too few free disk space are now handled (38129).
Error messages which are raised from the package manager are now displayed instead of displaying a traceback (37230).
The wording for app maintainer has been adjusted to app provider (37591).
The startup performance of the App Center has been improved (38345).
Fixed an exception in error handling (38926).
The display of buttons for installing, updating etc. have been improved (39042).
Added functionality for univention-upgrade to upgrade apps (38697).
Ini files may now specify how the app is to be included in the app reporting tool (38954).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: Attributes of the UCR policy are now sorted (32146).
Broken UDM handler modules are ignored when updating module list (38297).
An exception when handling LDAP exceptions is prevented now (38616).
The attribute ldapFilter has been added to policy UDM modules (36255).

The UDM module policies/mailquota has been moved to the package univention-mail-cyrus. From now on the module will only be available if the UCS domain contains an UCS system with installed Cyrus mail stack (38473).
A default user template for new users can be configured by the UCR variable directory/manager/web/modules/users/user/add/default. The variable expects the DN or the label of a user template (38832).
The evaluation of requiredObjectClass, prohibitedObjectClasses, fixedAttributes and emptyAttributes is now case insensitive (38663).
Extended the list of default language settings to include Switzerland, Austria and the United Kingdom (38512).
Show server address in Univention System Setup welcome screen in EC2 and other cloud environments (38391).
Uppercase hostnames and hostnames beginning with a digit are now possible (37816)
The package univention-welcome-screen has been added. It shows an informative screen which indicates how the system can be accessed via a web browser (37537).
Fixed an error which could occur while installing UCS with non-default locales via the text based installer, resulting in an unconfigured system (38382).
Changed the wording in the Univention System Setup to suit Univention App Appliances (38780 38781)

The new package univention-system-activation has been released. It registers a web service to enforce the upload of an activated license key prior to accessing the management web interface (38547 38782 38850).
Proxy settings were accidentally removed when changing network settings (38593).
The network mask is not overwritten in the initial UCS configuration anymore if if was set manually (38593).
A typo in the German translation has been corrected (38215).
If accessible, the name server specified via DHCP is pre-configured on the network settings page (38330).
The links on the last page of the setup wizard have been adjusted (38850).
A non authoritative DNS answer is now correctly handled during validation of settings (38522).
A information is shown during domain setup that the process might take a while (38833).
The NetBIOS domain name of the Active Directory domain is used when the UCS system joins into an Active Directory domain (37460).
The DHCP configuration of a system led to problems with the browser redirection at the end of the setup wizard. This has been corrected (39048)
The network settings module can now also be executed on unjoined systems (39044).
The wording on the activation page has been improved (39019).
The loading animation is now visible in Firefox (38918).

The default user template for new users can be configured via the UCR variable directory/manager/web/modules/users/user/add/default. The variable expects the DN or the label of a user template (38832).
The "contact" tab of the users module has a "country" entry now (18512).
Renaming of Domaincontroller or Memberserver computers is prevented now (38364).
Errors while requesting a new license are now handled (35614).
If too many user accounts for the license have been created, the UMC now provides information about how to re-enable editing (38836).
User accounts can now be disabled if the license count is exceeded (38835).
The Shares module has been moved into the "Domain" category (38202).
The update scripts have been adjusted to UCS 4.0-3 (38961).
Two new internal functions for UCS license checks have been added to the package univention-lib (38951).
If the initialization of the package manager failed it is retried (38951).
Held packages can't cause a traceback anymore (38951).
Error messages when opening APT Packages files have improved (38951).
Error messages when the system has too few free disk space have improved (38951).
The Python implementation of univention-policy-result did not evaluate the attributes requiredObjectClass and prohibitedObjectClasses. This has been fixed (38663).
The Python implementation of univention-policy-result did not return the most specific policy in all cases. This has been fixed (38712).
This update provides the new package univention-mail-dovecot which integrates the IMAP/POP3 server dovecot into the UCS mail stack (34839 38884).
dovecot has been updated to version 2.2.13. The update provides several bugfixes and enhancements (34839 38475).

The UCR variable mail/cyrus/auth/allowplaintext to (dis)allow plain text passwords over non-TLS connections has been added. The variable defaults to no. This changes the previous default behaviour! Plain text authentication over unencrypted connections is now disabled by default. To revert to the old behaviour set mail/cyrus/auth/allowplaintext=yes resp. mail/dovecot/auth/allowplaintext=yes (38500).
The UDM module policies/mailquota has been moved to the package univention-mail-cyrus. The UDM module will only be available if the UCS mail stack with Cyrus is installed (38473 39004).
Postfix will no longer resolve address mappings (e.g. BCC) before handing them over to AMaViS for content scanning if an archive folder has been defined (14619 38884).
To configure the max. number of concurrent AMaViS processes, a new UCR variable has been introduced: mail/antivir/max_servers. When unset, the current default 2 is used (37653).

Add options to check IP FQDN mapping as a means to fight spam. Adds two new UCR variables: mail/postfix/smtpd/restrictions/sender/reject_unknown_client_hostname and mail/postfix/smtpd/restrictions/sender/reject_unknown_reverse_client_hostname for weaker and stricter reverse DNS checking respectively (38292).
The package sieve-connect has been updated to version 0.87-1 and provides several bugfixes and new security features (34839).
The old printer model list is no longer deleted during the join (38117).
The check_univention_ldap plugin has been modified to use the FQDN of the LDAP server (27043).
A broken configuration was generated for named DHCP host entries. This issue has been fixed (38675).
The DHCP policies are now linked directly to the first created DHCP subnet instead of the LDAP base (38584).
The default DHCP policies are only used for the first created DHCP subnet (37614)
The default routing policy is only updated for the first created DHCP subnet (38822).
The &ucsUCRV; apache2/force_https can be used to force using encryption by re-directing to HTTPS (38016).
Huawei Unified Storage System S5500 V3 failed to join Samba AD domains. The Heimdal Kerberos server has been improved to allow the join (38827).
The VirtIO drivers for Windows have been updated to version 0.1.105 to fix a problem with broken driver signatures in Windows 2012 server (38655).
Samba has been upgraded to version 4.2.3 (37939).
The list of groups in the Kerberos PAC_LOGON_INFO now also contains the RID of primary group, this fixes GPO security filtering for primary group membership (37101).
Huawei Unified Storage System S5500 V3 failed to join Samba AD domains (38827).
A coding error in the Samba implementation of the BACKUPKEY serverwrap protocol may cause problems with retrieving saved passwords on Windows clients (DPAPI). This issue has been fixed (39025).
This update adds support for the default profile directory paths of Windows 8, 8.1 and 10. For new users they will now be created automatically on first logon (38643).
The ldb library and tools have been upgraded to version 1.1.20 (37939).
The talloc library has been upgraded to version 2.1.2 (37939).
The tdb library and tools have been upgraded to version 1.3.6 (37939).
The tevent library has been upgraded to version 0.9.25 (37939).
The package univention-ldb-modules has been rebuilt to match the new Samba version 4.2.3 (37939).
The user synchronization failed if the username contains special characters like an apostrophe. This issue has been fixed (38614).
The Samba 4/Active Directory lockout attributes are now reset while synchronizing the password from UCS to Samba 4 (38557).
Some GPO and WMI attributes have not been treated as single-value. This issue has been fixed (37259).
Some scripts have been optimized to allow a faster restart when the network interfaces are re-configured (36532).
The synchronization of objects with umlauts has been improved, for example for nested groups (38645).
A bug concerning renaming computer objects has been fixed (37709).
Ignore unknown Samba4 DNS objects instead of creating a dns/host_record (39077).
A bug in the network device detection has been fixed (39069).
Fix time synchronization to German UCS (38729).
Wrong links that lead to an old manual have been adjusted (38147).
The following packages have been added to the maintained package repository (37972, 38628):
The time zone database was updated to include information about the scheduled leap second at the end of June 2015 (38717).
The package clucene-core has been updated to version 2.3.3.4 (34839).
